item.title: Learning how to learn
item.description: 19:41 Saturday 11 July 2015 JST ed. note: This entry is crap; do not waste time reading it! Been going through Learning how to Learn, and just finished the video on Chunks, the first thing I didn’t “know” already. After the video, they posed a prompt: To allow you to better chunk the meaning of chunk, pause and recall, then write your best synthesis description here of the meaning of "chunking.
